urls.title: Flight Disruptions
urls.description: We’re committed to providing the highest quality of service to all our customers, and we believe it’s important to make our service commitments readily available to you. If your flight operated by Air Canada, Air Canada Rouge or Air Canada Express was disrupted, we’re here to assist and provide you with some helpful resources.
